PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-02652019-04-05,  ,  ,  ECCC,  HC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Chlor-Alkali Mercury Release Regulations
PrecisRegulations Repealing the CHLOR-ALKALI MERCURY RELEASE REGULATIONS allowing the application of the general prohibition under the Fisheries Act effectively preventing any future operation of chlor-alkali mercury cell facilities in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0088 Publication Date: 2019-04-17
